text: "I'll Be Your Shelter" is a 1990 song by Taylor Dayne and is the third single from her second studio album Can't Fight Fate. It went to number 4 in the United States and Australia, number 43 in the United Kingdom, number 33 in New Zealand and number 1 in Canada. It is a departure from her dance genre scene with more pop rock sounding. ==References== Category:1990 songs Category:Rock songs Category:Taylor Dayne songs
title: I'll Be Your Shelter
